meta.title: About Us | World Calculator
meta.description: World Calculator is built by coders and mathematicians passionate about making calculations fast, accurate, and accessible to everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We believe everyone deserves access to fast, accurate, and easy-to-use calculators. Whether you're planning a mortgage, tracking your fitness goals, or solving a math problem, we've got you covered.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.content1: World Calculator is built by a small team of software engineers and mathematicians who share a simple passion: making calculations faster and more accessible for everyone.
whoWeAre.content2: We've spent countless hours perfecting formulas, optimizing performance, and designing interfaces that just work. No sign-ups required, no data collection on your calculations. Just pure, reliable tools.

approach.title: Our Approach to Accuracy
approach.content1: Every calculator on World Calculator goes through a rigorous development process to ensure accuracy, reliability, and ease of use. We don't just implement formulas—we validate them against multiple authoritative sources and test them extensively across different scenarios.
approach.content2: Our commitment to precision means that whether you're calculating a mortgage payment, tracking your BMI, or converting units, you can trust the results. We cross-reference our formulas with financial institutions, medical guidelines, and mathematical standards to ensure they meet professional-grade accuracy requirements.

research.title: Research & Validation
research.description: We analyze competitor implementations, consult authoritative sources, and validate formulas against industry standards before writing a single line of code.

implement.title: Implementation
implement.description: Our engineers use TypeScript with strict type safety and comprehensive validation to ensure every input is properly handled and every edge case is considered.

validate.title: Quality Assurance
validate.description: Each calculator undergoes rigorous testing including unit tests, edge case validation, and real-world scenario verification to ensure accuracy.

test.title: Continuous Improvement
test.description: We monitor user feedback, track performance metrics, and regularly update our calculators to incorporate the latest formulas and best practices.

team.title: The Team Behind World Calculator
team.content: Our team combines expertise in software engineering, mathematics, financial analysis, and user experience design. With backgrounds ranging from fintech development to academic research, we bring a diverse set of skills to ensure every calculator is both technically sound and user-friendly. We're passionate about democratizing access to powerful calculation tools that traditionally required expensive software or specialized knowledge. Based across Europe, we work remotely but stay united by our mission to make accurate calculations accessible to everyone, everywhere.

free.title: 100% Free
free.description: All calculators are completely free to use, forever. No premium tiers or hidden features.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your calculations stay in your browser. We never see, store, or sell your data.

precision.title: Precision Matters
precision.description: Built by mathematicians who obsess over accuracy. Every formula is verified and tested.

everywhere.title: Works Everywhere
everywhere.description: Available in 6 languages with locale-specific formatting. Use it on any device.

company.title: Company Information
company.content: World Calculator is operated by Roques OÜ, a technology company registered in Estonia (EU). As an EU-registered entity, we adhere to strict data protection standards under GDPR and maintain transparent business practices. Our operations are based in Tallinn, Estonia, where we combine European regulatory compliance with a commitment to innovation and user privacy. We're proud to be part of Estonia's thriving digital ecosystem, known for its advanced e-governance and technology infrastructure.
company.name: Roques OÜ

future.title: What's Next: AI-Powered Calculations
future.content: We're working on the next evolution of World Calculator: AI-enhanced tools that understand your questions in plain language and guide you to the right answer.

email.title: Send Us an Email

meta.title: Privacy Policy & Terms of Service | World Calculator
meta.description: Privacy policy, terms of service, and data protection information for World Calculator users. Learn how we handle your data in compliance with GDPR and EU regulations.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content1: World Calculator ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our free online calculator platform at worldcalculator.org (the "Service").
introduction.content2: We comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) (EU) 2016/679 and other applicable data protection laws.

dataController.title: 2. Data Controller
dataController.intro: The data controller responsible for your personal data is:

calculatorPrivacy.title: 3. Calculator Data Privacy
calculatorPrivacy.highlight: We do not store, collect, or sell the data you enter into our calculators.
calculatorPrivacy.content: All calculator inputs and results are processed entirely in your browser. Your calculations never leave your device and are not transmitted to our servers. We have no access to the numbers, amounts, or any other information you enter into our calculators.

dataCollect.title: 4. Data We Collect
dataCollect.intro: We collect the following categories of information:

technical.title: 4.1 Technical Data
items: Pages visited and time spent on pages

cookie.title: 4.2 Cookie Data
cookie.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your experience. See Section 7 for detailed information about cookies.

purpose.title: 5. Purpose of Processing
purpose.intro: We process your data for the following purposes:
purpose.provision: Service Provision: To deliver our free calculator tools and ensure they function correctly
purpose.analytics: Analytics: To understand how visitors use our Service and improve user experience
purpose.security: Security: To detect and prevent fraud, abuse, and security incidents
purpose.legal: Legal Compliance: To comply with applicable laws and regulations

legalBasis.title: 6. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.intro: Under GDPR, we process your personal data based on:
legalBasis.legitimate: Legitimate Interest (Article 6(1)(f)): To operate and improve our Service, perform analytics, and ensure security
legalBasis.consent: Consent (Article 6(1)(a)): For non-essential cookies (you can withdraw consent at any time)
legalBasis.obligation: Legal Obligation (Article 6(1)(c)): To comply with applicable laws

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.intro: We use cookies to enhance your experience. Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us recognize you and remember your preferences.

essential.title: Essential Cookies (Required)
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

advertising.title: Advertising Cookies
advertising.description: Used to deliver relevant advertisements and measure ad performance.
items: Google AdSense: Ad personalization and delivery

consent.title: 7.2 Cookie Consent
consent.intro: When you first visit our website, you will see a cookie consent banner at the bottom of the page. You can choose to accept or decline personalized advertising.
consent.accept: If you accept: You will see personalized ads based on your interests and browsing behavior, which helps support our free service.
consent.decline: If you decline: You will see non-personalized (generic) ads that are not based on your browsing history. You can still use all our calculators without any limitations.
consent.preference: Your preference is stored in your browser. To change your preference, click "Cookie Settings" in the footer.

management.title: 7.3 Managing Cookies in Your Browser
management.content: You can also control and delete cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our Service.

thirdParty.title: 8. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: We share data with the following third-party service providers:

vercel.name: Vercel Inc.
vercel.data: Data shared: Technical data, page views, performance metrics

adsense.name: Google AdSense
adsense.data: Data shared: Cookies, device identifiers, browsing behavior for personalized ads
adsense.optOut: Google uses cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits. You can opt out of personalized advertising at google.com/settings/ads

retention.title: 9. Data Retention
retention.intro: We retain your data for the following periods:
retention.cookies: Cookie data: Varies by cookie type (see cookie settings for specifics)
retention.calculator: Calculator input data is not retained as it never leaves your browser.

rights.title: 10. Your Rights Under GDPR
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
rights.access: Right to Access: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
rights.rectification: Right to Rectification: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
rights.erasure: Right to Erasure ("Right to be Forgotten"): Request deletion of your personal data
rights.restriction: Right to Restriction: Request limitation of processing your data
rights.portability: Right to Data Portability: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
rights.object: Right to Object: Object to processing based on legitimate interests
rights.withdraw: Right to Withdraw Consent: Withdraw your consent for cookie-based processing at any time
rights.exercise: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at legal@invoo.es. We will respond within one month.
rights.complaint: If you are not satisfied with our response, you have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.

transfers.title: 11. International Data Transfers
transfers.intro: Our Service is hosted within the European Union. However, some of our third-party service providers (such as Vercel) may process data outside the EU/EEA.
transfers.safeguards: When data is transferred outside the EU/EEA, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, including:
transfers.clauses: Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission
transfers.adequacy: Adequacy decisions by the European Commission

security.title: 12. Data Security
security.intro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction, including:
security.https: HTTPS encryption for all data transmission
security.hosting: Secure hosting infrastructure with regular security updates
security.disclaimer: However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your data, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

children.title: 13. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our Service is not directed to children under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 16. If you believe we have collected data from a child under 16, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: 14. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content1: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for legal, operational, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on this page with a new "Last updated" date.
changes.content2: We encourage you to review this privacy policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your data.

privacyContact.title: 15. Contact Us
privacyContact.intro: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using World Calculator ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our Service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: World Calculator provides free online calculator tools for finance, health, math, and other purposes. The Service is provided "as is" and is intended for informational and educational purposes only.

acceptable.title: 3. Acceptable Use
acceptable.intro: You agree to use the Service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to:
acceptable.violate: Use the Service in any way that violates applicable laws or regulations
acceptable.interfere: Attempt to interfere with or disrupt the Service or its servers
acceptable.extract: Use automated systems or software to extract data from the Service
acceptable.impersonate: Impersonate or attempt to impersonate World Calculator or its representatives

disclaimer.title: 4. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.highlight: The calculations provided by World Calculator are for informational purposes only and should not be considered as professional financial, medical, legal, or other advice. Always consult with qualified professionals for important decisions.
disclaimer.accuracy: We make no warranties or representations about the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of the calculations. While we strive for accuracy, errors may occur. Use the results at your own discretion.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.intro: To the fullest extent permitted by law, World Calculator and its operators shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses, resulting from:
liability.use: Your use or inability to use the Service
liability.errors: Any errors or inaccuracies in the calculations
liability.access: Unauthorized access to or alteration of your data
liability.conduct: Any third-party conduct on the Service

intellectual.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by World Calculator and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

modifications.title: 7. Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by updating the "Last updated" date at the top of this page. Your continued use of the Service after any changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

governing.title: 8. Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Estonia, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from these Terms or the Service shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Estonia.

termsContact.title: 9. Contact Information
termsContact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at legal@invoo.es.
